make sure that whenever a government agency whenever somebody in the public sector collects and and maintains a

true that a lot of data was being collected duplicative ly across the country so a state would go out and fly

been a big change in our space to is trying to understand what our role is in implementing this idea of the national

that in 1994 in the early 90s geospatial was really kind of a niche thing you had

word planned in a in a field in the the metadata that just says this agency
